idemeum

Making digital identity simple, secure, and private.

Want to learn more?

idemeum is a decentralized, verified, mobile identity platform

Decentralized

We give people the power to own and control their digital identity.

We make it private and secure.

Verified

We verify all user information to ensure that the user is who he says he is.

We reduce fraud.

Mobile

Mobile device is the front and center of digital identity experience.

We make it simple.

Tired of passwords? We eliminate passwords end to end

We will help you eliminate passwords 100% - not just for authentication, but also for onboarding. We cover whole password lifecycle.

2.3B credentials stolen in 2017 alone (Shape Security).

Passwords are very easy to phish, steal, or compromise.
$14.7B in losses due to fraud in 2019. (Javelin 2019 Identity Fraud Study)

$70 is the average cost for a password reset (Okta).

24 hours is the average time employee spends on logins per year (Verizon Data Breach Report, 2019)
51% of people dislike remembering yet another password

80% of workers reported being fed up with using passwords (Online Registration and Password Study)

Want to keep fraudsters out?We help reduce fraud

As we transition to remote world, identity verification and online trust become ever more important. idemeum has identity verification built in. We will help identify people behind devices.

600% increase in phishing attacks due to COVID-19 (Info Security Magazine).
$1.9B is total fraud loss in 2019 (Consumer Sentinel Data).

88% growth in new credit card account fraud (Consumer Sentinel Data).

Concerned about privacy?idemeum enables 100% privacy

idemeum is a decentralized platform, meaning all sensitive user information is stored on users' devices. We have zero PII in our backend.

Yes, you got that right - we do not store any user identifiable information in our backend.

Read more about how we do it.

Tired of identity complexity?idemeum provides one stop shop solution

We provide an identity solution to replace them all: passwords, tokens, magic links, certificates, and MFA.

Moreover, you can accelerate your Zero-Trust journey by deploying idemeum and embracing passwordless.

idemeum provides simple, unified, and cross platform experience for your users.

Desktop? Mobile? We got it all covered.
Deploy idemeum in under and hour. Just connect to your identity provider.

No connectors, no user syns, no additional servers. We made it simple.
